title: Americano Recipe
full_text:
Americano Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 1/2
ounces
Campari
1 1/2
ounces
sweet vermouth
2 to 3
ounces
club soda
Orange wheel
to garnish
Directions
Pour Campari and vermouth into an ice-filled highball glass; top with club soda. Garnish with an orange wheel.
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
